resources.string: In the first 3 years of competition for the American Football World Cup (also known as the IFAF World Cup and Gridiron World Cup), which country won twice and was runner up once?
In what year was the first demonstration of a helicopter lifting itself organised by Louis Breguet and Professor Richet?
The main ingredient of what dish is potato?
From 1895 to 1952 the island of Taiwan was under the sovereignty of which country?
